result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Johnnie Edwards Collins

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Johnnie Edwards Collins in court.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter in court for Johnnie Edwards Collins.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Johnnie Edwards Collins appeared by video.  Attorney Allison Marie Ritter appeared by video for Johnnie Edwards Collins.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel was recently appointed and requests additional time to meet with defendant.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Johnnie Edwards Collins in court.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Defendant appears in Court without counsel.  Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation. Defendant requests court appointed counsel at the county rate. Court appoints Attorney Allison Ritter who shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court orders defendant to repay the County at a rate to be determined at the conclusion of the case.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court orders bail to be returned to the person who posted.

ADDRESS INFO for Johnnie Edwards Collins
Current: 7452 N Granville RD #7, Milwaukee, WI 53224   (Effective: 07-27-2022)
Prior: 4937 North 39th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with TCB.
  Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Johnnie Edwards Collins in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 35.
Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 7/27/22 @ 2p
